hero.sub: Scan the QR at your table, pick your song and bid to play it first. No shouting at the DJ. No waiting. With real money.

steps.title: 3 steps and your song plays
steps.sub: No setup required. Scan, pick and bid. That simple.

step1.title: Scan the QR
step1.desc: Every bar has a QR on the table or bar. Scan it with your camera and jump straight into the venue's active session. No app needed to start.

step2.title: Find your song
step2.desc: Search any YouTube song directly from the app. See the queue in real time — who bid how much and where each song stands.

step3.title: Bid to win
step3.desc: The song with the highest bid plays first. Top up with Nequi, PSE or card and bid whatever you want. The more you bid, the higher your song goes.

mechanics.title: 6 ways to control the night
mechanics.sub: Every transaction generates revenue for the host. You choose how much to pay.

conexion.name: Connection
conexion.desc: Pay to enter the bar session. The host decides if it's free or paid. Registered users get 2 free connections per month at any VIBRRA bar.

puja.name: Bid
puja.desc: Push your song up the queue. The highest bid plays first. When someone outbids you, you can bid again — the battle is part of the game.

cancion.name: Add song
cancion.desc: Your song not in the queue? Search YouTube and add it yourself. You pay the initial bid set by the bar. Registered users get 3 free songs per month.

dedicatoria.name: Dedication
dedicatoria.desc: Write a message to someone. When your song plays, the message appears on the bar screen for everyone to see. Birthdays, confessions, bets.

veto.name: Veto
veto.desc: Hate a song in the queue? Veto it. If total vetoes exceed the song's highest bid, it gets removed. Veto alone or team up.

batalla.name: Battle
batalla.desc: The host launches a battle: 2 songs compete. Vote with real money. The winner enters the queue with that bid. The whole bar joins in.

calculator.title: Calculate your earnings
calculator.sub: Adjust the parameters for your bar and see in real time how much you can earn with VIBRRA.
calculator.disclaimer: Estimates with average values. Actual results depend on your bar's activity. Subscription: $15,000 COP/month per venue (first month free).

host.title:
Your bar already has music.

Now make it pay.
host.sub: No extra DJ. No hardware. Just the PC you already have with VIBRRA on top of YouTube.
host.income1Desc: Every client joining your session pays the price you set.
host.income2Desc: Every time someone pushes a song up the queue, you get 70%.
host.income3Desc: Every special mechanic your clients use also earns you 70%.
host.disclaimer: Your balance accumulates in your VIBRRA account and you can withdraw it in the first 10 days of each month. No matter how many venues you have — a single monthly withdrawal of the total.

client.title:
Sign up and get

real benefits
client.sub: Anonymous users can bid. Registered guests get permanent perks.
client.benefit1Sub: At any VIBRRA bar every month
client.benefit2Sub: To add to the queue every month
client.benefit3Sub: Extra on the first top-up of the month
client.benefit4Sub: Get notified when your favorite bar opens
client.benefit5Sub: Request your saved songs in 1 tap
client.availability: Available on Google Play and App Store

map.title:
Find active VIBRRA bars

near you
map.sub: See in real time which bars have active sessions, what genres are playing tonight and what the average bid is before heading out.

cta.title:
Your bar active in

under 1 hour
cta.sub: First month free. No lock-in contract. You just need a PC with Chrome and a valid OSA certificate.
cta.step1Desc: Create your account and fill in venue details in 10 minutes.
cta.step2Desc: Downloads in 30 seconds. Sign in via QR from your phone.
cta.step3Title: Print your QR and start a session
cta.step3Desc: VIBRRA gives you a print-ready QR. Place it on tables and you're set.
cta.legal:
Requires valid OSA/SAYCO-ACINPRO certificate

+ Business registration · Law 1801 of 2016

access.sub: Three access points, each designed for your role in VIBRRA.
access.chromeHint: Sign in by scanning the QR from the Chrome extension
access.companyHint: Manage multiple venues from a single corporate dashboard.

footer.tagline: The digital jukebox that turns your bar's music into a revenue stream.

recarga.title: Top up and bid for your song
recarga.sub: Pick an amount, pay with Nequi, PSE or card and your balance is credited instantly.
recarga.disclaimer: Balance is credited immediately after payment confirmation. Bonuses are non-withdrawable. Top-ups are non-refundable.
recarga.loginRequired: Sign in to top up your balance

banner.planDesc: Full dashboard access, Chrome extension, unlimited sessions and support.
banner.bonoDesc: Claimed from the dashboard when you create your first venue. The system automatically verifies all requirements before crediting it.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.subtitle: You'll use this email to access the host dashboard from any device.
step1.emailHint: You'll receive notifications and session reports here.
step1.securityNote: Your password is securely stored with bcrypt encryption. VIBRRA will never have access to it in plain text.

step2.title: Identity verification
step2.subtitle: Required by the UIAF (Financial Information and Analysis Unit) for platforms that process payments in Colombia.
step2.docInfo: Upload a clear photo of your ID. Both sides are required. The image must be legible and uncut.
step2.docFormats: JPG or PNG · Max 5MB per image · Clear background, good lighting

step3.title: Tax information
step3.subtitle: Required for electronic invoicing with DIAN and correct withholding calculations on your withdrawals.
step3.naturalDesc: You operate using your ID as tax number. Applies to most independent hosts.
step3.juridicaDesc: Your venue is established as a SAS, S.A. or other legal entity with its own tax ID.
step3.nitHint: For individuals, use your ID number. For companies, use the NIT with verification digit.
step3.rutInfo: The RUT is the Unified Tax Registry issued by DIAN. It must be up to date with your business activity. If you don't have a RUT, you can get one for free at dian.gov.co
step3.rutUploadDesc: PDF or clear image · Max 5MB · Must be the original DIAN document
step3.noIvaDesc: Annual gross income under 3,500 UVT (~$171M COP in 2025). Most small bars qualify here.
step3.siIvaDesc: You exceed the threshold or have a special registration with DIAN.

step4.title: Bank account
step4.subtitle: This is where you'll receive your withdrawals. The account must be in your name or the registered company's name.
step4.titularPlaceholder: Name exactly as it appears at the bank
step4.titularHint: Must match the name on the registered ID document.
step4.retiroInfo: Withdrawals are processed via ePayco Split Payments. Estimated clearing time is 1–3 business days. Withholding tax applies based on your tax regime.

step5.title: Terms and privacy
step5.subtitle: Read and accept each item. They are mandatory to activate your account and credit the welcome bonus.
step5.terminosDesc: I accept the platform's terms of use, including the 30% commission on transactions, session operation rules, bid queue model and bonus policy.
step5.datosDesc: I authorize the processing of my personal data under Law 1581 of 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013. My data will be used to operate the platform and fulfill legal obligations.
step5.pagosDesc: I understand that host top-ups are processed via Wompi/ePayco at a rate of ~2.68% + $900/tx. Clients do not top up via payment gateway. VIBRRA may withhold payments in case of disputes or detected fraud.
step5.publicidadDesc: I accept that up to 10% of songs in my queue per session may be free redemptions from users who watched brand ads. This is the platform's operating model and is not configurable.
step5.reportesDesc: I want to receive weekly session reports, platform updates and tips to optimize my revenue by email.
step5.legalNote: VIBRRA is a platform registered in Colombia. This acceptance has legal validity under Law 527 of 1999 (electronic commerce) and Law 1581 of 2012 (personal data protection).

validation.legalRequired: You must accept all mandatory conditions to continue.
